Name: Voidwisp Harbinger
Story Background: Whispered in hushed tales among planeswalkers, the Voidwisp Harbingers are enigmatic spirits that herald the arrival of otherworldly forces, their presence resonating with unseen mysteries.
Ability: Flash, Flying, When Voidwisp Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
Appearance Description: The Voidwisp Harbinger manifests as a spectral figure wreathed in shimmering wisps of ethereal energy that constantly shift and undulate. Its gaze seems to pierce through the fabric of reality, hinting at the profound knowledge and secrets it holds.
